com.invensense.cubequat

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invensense.cubequat.Cube

  • public class Cube
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the model class to for the rolling dice view to provide the abstract data that is necessary to setup and display the cube

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(GL10 gl, int filter)
      This function lets you draw the cube with the provided opengl interface object.
      void loadGLTexture(GL10 gl, Context context)
      This function will load and bind the textures with six faces of the cube.

      • Cube

        public Cube(GL10 gl,
    Context context)
        Constructor function to setup the load and initialize the model class of rolling dice
        Parameters:
        gl - opengl interface object
        context - activity context necessary to load and initialize textures from resources.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(GL10 gl,
        int filter)
        This function lets you draw the cube with the provided opengl interface object.
        Parameters:
        gl - opengl interface object.
        filter - an optional filter to bind the texture according to the set texture filter.
